current projects IT specialist The Employer September 2011 to September 2014 Job description Supporting user computers printers solving daily user problems daily assistance for network administration network designing and installation for new branches local telephony system maintenance hardware equipment supply IT expense reporting and analyzing the tracking out of repaired and spare equipment
